DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study select size mold rotation mark new toric contact lens compare visibility various mold rotation mark .
DOC.brief_title: On-Eye Evaluation Contact Lens Rotation Marks
DOC.detailed_description: Participants wear test control product contralaterally ( eye separately ) 2 hour , Investigator assess various molded rotation mark visibility . Each participant assess 10 investigator .
DOC.criteria: Sign Informed Consent document . Best correct distance visual acuity ( VA ) great equal 20/25 eye . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . History ocular surgery ocular injury within 12 week study enrollment . Any ocular disease , infection , inflammation , abnormality contraindicates contact lens ( CL ) wear . History herpetic keratitis . Slitlamp finding great grade 2 baseline . Any use systemic ocular medication CL wear could contraindicate . Inactive corneal neovascularization great 1 millimeter penetration . A clinically significant dry eye respond treatment . History refractive surgery . Participation clinical study within previous 30 day . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
